title: Start to edit a documentation topic
contents:
mode_edit

開始編輯文件主題link

Start to edit a documentation topiclink

本主題介紹當你開始處理文件問題時要執行的任務。

This topic describes the tasks that you perform when you start to work on a documentation issue.

angular.io 中的文件是從markdown原始碼檔案建構的。Markdown 原始碼檔案儲存在你 fork 到 GitHub 帳戶中的 angular 儲存庫中。

The documentation in angular.io is built from markdown source code files. The markdown source code files are stored in the angular repo that you forked into your GitHub account.

要更新 Angular 文件，你需要：

To update the Angular documentation, you need:

  • personal/angular 的複製

    A clone of personal/angular

    你在建立工作區時建立了它。在開始編輯主題之前，請更新你的 personal/angular 複製。

    You created this when you created your workspace. Before you start editing a topic, update your clone of personal/angular.

  • 你從最新的 main 分支建立的 working 分支。

    A working branch that you create from an up-to-date main branch.

    本主題後面會介紹如何建立 working 分支。

    Creating your working branch is described later in this topic.

本主題中的過程假定本地計算機上的檔案的組織方式如下圖所示。在你的本地計算機上，你應該有：

The procedures in this topic assume that the files on your local computer are organized as illustrated in the following diagram. On your local computer, you should have:

  • 你的 'git' 工作區目錄。在此範例中，你的 “git” 工作空間目錄的路徑是 github-projects。

    Your 'git' workspace directory. In this example, the path to your 'git' workspace directory is github-projects.

  • 你的工作目錄，這是你將 fork 複製到 git 工作區時建立的目錄。在此範例中，你的工作目錄的路徑是 github-projects/personal/angular，其中的 personal 被替換為你的 GitHub 使用者名稱。

    Your working directory, which is the directory that you created when you cloned your fork into your git workspace. In this example, the path to your working directory is github-projects/personal/angular, where personal is replaced with your GitHub username.

IMPORTANT:
Remember to replace personal with your GitHub username in the commands and examples in this topic.

本主題中的過程假定你是從工作區目錄啟動的。

The procedures in this topic assume that you are starting from your workspace directory.

使用上游儲存庫更新你的 forklink

Update your fork with the upstream repolink

在開始編輯文件檔案之前，你希望將 fork 的 main 分支及其複製與上游 angular/angular 儲存庫的 main 分支同步。

Before you start editing the documentation files, you want to sync the main branch of your fork and its clone with the main branch of the upstream angular/angular repo.

此過程會更新你在雲端的 personal/angular 儲存庫及其本地計算機上的複製，如此處所示。帶圓圈的數字對應於過程步驟。

This procedure updates the your personal/angular repo in the cloud and its clone on your local computer, as illustrated here. The circled numbers correspond to procedure steps.

使用上游儲存庫更新你的 fork 及其複製link

To update your fork and its clone with the upstream repolink

從本地計算機上的命令列工具執行這些步驟。

Perform these steps from a command-line tool on your local computer.

  1. 從你的工作區目錄，執行此命令以導航到你的工作目錄。圖像中未顯示此步驟。請記住將 personal 替換為你的 GitHub 使用者名稱。

    From your workspace directory, run this command to navigate to your working directory. This step is not shown in the image. Remember to replace personal with your GitHub username.

    cd personal/angular

  2. 執行此命令以簽出 main 分支。圖像中未顯示此步驟。

    Run this command to check out the main branch. This step is not shown in the image.

    git checkout main

  3. 執行此命令，以從上游 angular/angular 儲存庫更新本地計算機工作目錄中的 main 分支。

    Run this command to update the main branch in the working directory on your local computer from the upstream angular/angular repo.

    git fetch upstream git merge upstream/main

  4. 執行此命令，使用上游 angular/angular 儲存庫中的最新內容更新你在 github.com 上的 personal/angular 儲存庫。

    Run this command to update your personal/angular repo on github.com with the latest from the upstream angular/angular repo.

    git push

你本地計算機上的 main 分支現在與你在 github.com 上的原始儲存庫同步。自你上次更新 fork 以來，它們已經使用對上游 angular/angular 儲存庫所做的任何更改進行了更新。

The main branch on your local computer is now in sync with your origin repo on github.com. They have been updated with any changes that have been made to the upstream angular/angular repo since the last time you updated your fork.

建立工作分支進行編輯link

Create a working branch for editinglink

你對 Angular 文件的所有編輯都是在本地計算機上 personal/angular 複製的 working 分支中進行的。你從本地計算機上的 personal/angular 的最新 main 分支建立工作分支。

All your edits to the Angular documentation are made in a working branch in the clone of personal/angular on your local computer. You create the working branch from the up-to-date main branch of personal/angular on your local computer.

工作分支會將你對 Angular 文件的更改與已釋出的文件分開，直到它準備就緒。工作分支還會將你對一個問題的編輯與另一個問題的編輯分開。最後，一個工作分支會識別你在完成後提交的 Pull Request 中所做的更改。

A working branch keeps your changes to the Angular documentation separate from the published documentation until it is ready. A working branch also keeps your edits for one issue separate from those of another issue. Finally, a working branch identifies the changes you made in the pull request that you submit when you're finished.

IMPORTANT:
Before you edit any Angular documentation, make sure that you are using the correct working branch. You can confirm your current branch by running git status from your working directory before you start editing.

建立 working 分支進行編輯link

To create a working branch for editinglink

在本地計算機上的命令列程式中執行這些步驟。

Perform these steps in a command-line program on your local computer.

  1. 更新你的 angular/angular 分支。

    Update your fork of angular/angular.

  2. 從你的工作區目錄，執行此命令以導航到你的工作目錄。請記住將 personal 替換為你的 GitHub 使用者名稱。

    From your workspace directory, run this command to navigate to your working directory. Remember to replace personal with your GitHub username.

    cd personal/angular

  3. 執行此命令以簽出 main 分支。

    Run this command to check out the main branch.

    git checkout main

  4. 執行此命令以建立你的工作分支。將 working-branch 替換為你的工作分支的名稱。

    Run this command to create your working branch. Replace working-branch with the name of your working branch.

    為你的工作分支命名與你的編輯任務相關的內容，例如，如果你要解決 issue #12345，你可以將分支命名為 issue-12345。如果你正在改進錯誤訊息，你可以將其命名為 error-message-improvements。分支名稱可以有字母數字字元、連字元、下劃線和斜線，但不能有任何空格或其他特殊字元。

    Name your working branch something that relates to your editing task, for example, if you are resolving issue #12345, you might name the branch, issue-12345. If you are improving error messages, you might name it, error-message-improvements. A branch name can have alphanumeric characters, hyphens, underscores, and slashes, but it can't have any spaces or other special characters.

    git checkout -b working-branch

  5. 執行此命令，在雲端的 github.com 上的儲存庫中複製你的工作分支。請記住將 working-branch 替換為你的工作分支的名稱。

    Run this command to make a copy of your working branch in your repo on github.com in the cloud. Remember to replace working-branch with the name of your working branch.

    git push --set-upstream origin working-branch

編輯文件link

Edit the documentationlink

建立工作分支後，你就可以開始編輯和建立主題了。

After you create a working branch, you're ready to start editing and creating topics.

最後複查時間：10/12/2022
